mapper.update:
update pjt_project
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_code = #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag_available = #{flagAvailable,jdbcType=BIT},
flag_deleted = #{flagDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
belong_object_type = #{belongObjectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
belong_object_id = #{belongObjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_person = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_person = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
flag_default = #{flagDefault,jdbcType=BIT},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM pjt_project WHERE flag_deleted = 0 AND flag_available = 1 AND id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT pro.id, comp.company_name companyName, pro.project_name projectName, pro.project_code projectCode, pro.create_time createTime, pro.update_time updateTime, suer.username createPerson, pro.flag_available flagAvailable FROM pjt_project pro LEFT JOIN sys_company_users suer on pro.create_person = suer.id LEFT JOIN dmi_company_info comp on comp.id = pro.company_id where pro.flag_deleted = 0 AND pro.flag_available = 1 AND pro.flag_default = 1 ORDER BY pro.create_time DESC

SELECT pro.id, pro.project_name projectName, pro.project_code projectCode, pro.create_time createTime, pro.update_time updateTime FROM pjt_project pro where pro.flag_deleted = 0 AND pro.flag_available = 1 AND pro.flag_default = 1 AND companyId=#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
